description: This luscious vegan potato salad is made with tender red potatoes in luscious cashew dressing with fresh dill, scallions and a (totally optional!) sprinkling of tempeh bacon. Rich, creamy, and packed with flavor!
name: Vegan Potato Salad with Creamy Dill Dressing and (Optional!) Tempeh Bacon Bits
recipeIngredient: 1 (8 ounce) package tempeh, (finely minced or crumbled)
1 cup raw cashews, (soaked in water 4-8 hours and drained)
3/4 cup unflavored soy or almond milk
1/2 cup finely chopped red onion, (about 1/4 of a medium onion)

recipeInstructions.text: Stir soy sauce or tamari, vinegar, maple syrup and liquid smoke together in a small bowl.
Stir in the tempeh and allow to marinate for at least 30 minutes. (You can skip to making the potato salad in the meantime.)
Coat the bottom of a medium skillet with oil and place it over medium-high heat. Add tempe and the marinade.
Cook until most of the liquid has cooked off and tempeh is nicely browned, about 10 minutes, flipping once or twice.
